course_description: Covers astronomical coordinates, celestial mechanics, Kepler's Laws, gravitation, planetary analysis techniques, planetary and interplanetary debris composition and structure, ring system formation, extrasolar planetary systems, with laboratory sessions in the Emory observatory.
prerequisites: This course requires PHYS 253 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
